recipesJson.name: Gamer Fuel
recipesJson.author: CountryChicken
recipesJson.description:
This abomination was created through a discussion in my Eve Online fleet. 
It sounded interesting, so i mixed it to try it out :)  After mixing it, this has become my most well liked recipe, with everyone who has tried it really enjoying it. Mix it up and see what ya think ðŸ˜Š

Sweetener is set that high on purpose. Feel free to set it to where ever you feel comfortable.
